instructions: From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap MORE . Tap Settings . Tap Call rejection . Tap Auto reject list . Add desired number.
From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap MORE . Tap Settings . Tap Call blocking . Tap Block list . Add desired number.
From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap MORE . Tap Settings . Tap Call rejection . Tap Auto reject list . Tap the minus sign next to the number.
From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap MORE . Tap Settings . Tap Call blocking . Tap Block list . Tap the minus sign next to the number.
From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap MORE . Tap Settings . Tap More settings . Tap Call forwarding . Tap Always forward . Enter phone number to forward calls to. Tap Turn on .

From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap MORE . Tap Settings . Tap More settings . Tap Call forwarding . Tap desired forwarding option: Forward when busy Forward when unanswered Forward when unreachable Enter phone number to forward calls to. Tap Update .
From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap MORE . Tap Settings . Tap More settings . Tap Call forwarding . Tap Always forward . Tap Turn off .
From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap MORE . Tap Settings . Tap More settings . Tap Caller ID . Tap desired setting to view or edit: Network default Hide number Show number
From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap Logs . Tap MORE > Delete . Select the Select log items check box. Tap Delete .
From the Home screen, tap Phone . Tap Logs . View the list of calls. Tap a call to view its details.
